title: philipma1957
author: philipma1957
content: https://www.bestbuy.com/site/asus-nvidia-geforce-rtx-4070-overclock-12gb-gddr6x-pci-express-4-0-graphics-card/6540001.p?skuId=6540001599 plus tax in stock at the moment

comments.author: P00P135
comments.body: I think there will be plenty of stock of these over price cut down GPUs.

comments.author: philipma1957
comments.body: Quote from: P00P135 on April 13, 2023, 03:52:59 PMI think there will be plenty of stock of these over price cut down GPUs.yeah very likely to be true.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Take your time with shopping, look at the tests.First test on the Кaspa coinhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Mf92ldQfdMQ&ab_channel=DizzyMining970Mh/s and 770Mh/s with lower kernel settings.I haven't seen any outstanding achievements yet, so I'll wait a week. I'm interested in the hashrate of all popular coins on this video card

comments.author: philipma1957
comments.body: Quote from: FP91G on April 14, 2023, 01:21:49 PMTake your time with shopping, look at the tests.First test on the Кaspa coinhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Mf92ldQfdMQ&ab_channel=DizzyMining970Mh/s and 770Mh/s with lower kernel settings.I haven't seen any outstanding achievements yet, so I'll wait a week. I'm interested in the hashrate of all popular coins on this video cardIt comes today.I will likely do octopus with it.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: New tests addedhttps://hashrate.no/gpus/4070In Russia, such a video card MSI GeForce RTX 4070 VENTUS 2X OC 12G costs 850 dollars, and I don’t like this cooling according to the models. The PALIT GeForce RTX 4070 DUAL 12G graphics card is $35 off. While there is no choice and the price is expensive.

comments.author: rdluffy
comments.body: Looks like the sweet spot of RTX 4xxx generationOnly one connector, 12gb GDDR6X and a reasonable price.Post some actual pictures of your gpu if you can, and what you will mine with it.Did you buy one just to test it?In my country it is not available yet, only for shipment starting May 15

comments.author: philipma1957
comments.body: Quote from: rdluffy on April 15, 2023, 04:22:10 PMLooks like the sweet spot of RTX 4xxx generationOnly one connector, 12gb GDDR6X and a reasonable price.Post some actual pictures of your gpu if you can, and what you will mine with it.Did you buy one just to test it?In my country it is not available yet, only for shipment starting May 15Yeah first off I got this one.https://www.bestbuy.com/site/nvidia-geforce-rtx-4070-12gb-gddr6x-graphics-card-titanium-and-black/6539358.p?skuId=6539358here it is paired with a 3090 just Hooked up to do octopusit pulls 134 watts to do 59 mhand 3090 pulls 299 watts to do 99 mhclearly more efficient than a 3090 while doing octopus.

comments.author: sxemini
comments.body: Quote from: philipma1957 on April 15, 2023, 05:35:28 PMQuote from: rdluffy on April 15, 2023, 04:22:10 PMLooks like the sweet spot of RTX 4xxx generationOnly one connector, 12gb GDDR6X and a reasonable price.Post some actual pictures of your gpu if you can, and what you will mine with it.Did you buy one just to test it?In my country it is not available yet, only for shipment starting May 15Yeah first off I got this one.https://www.bestbuy.com/site/nvidia-geforce-rtx-4070-12gb-gddr6x-graphics-card-titanium-and-black/6539358.p?skuId=6539358here it is paired with a 3090 just Hooked up to do octopusit pulls 134 watts to do 59 mhand 3090 pulls 299 watts to do 99 mhclearly more efficient than a 3090 while doing octopus.59mh @134w? not much better than a RTX3070 with 54mh @ 135w

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: The calculator shows a small profit on octopus.It's bad that Founders Edition does not have an 8-pin power connector.No one will scare old miners with low profit How close you have such powerful video cards installed. I wouldn't do that.

comments.author: Dowper_
comments.body: Quote from: rdluffy on April 15, 2023, 04:22:10 PMLooks like the sweet spot of RTX 4xxx generationOnly one connector, 12gb GDDR6X and a reasonable price.I do not agree, ROI is slightly worse than 4070 Ti, and after brake-even you will make less profit with 4070 compared to 4070 Ti. Also 4070 with 1x8pin connector are with smaller cooler.

comments.author: batsonxl
comments.body: Congrats with new gpu,looking good and i think there will some coins more profitable for newer gpus.

comments.author: philipma1957
comments.body: @ fp915Well the 3090 is watercooled. you can lay cards on top of it and it runs cool.there are two low power 3060s beyond the 3090so 4070 - large space - water cooled kingpin 3090 - 3060 - 3060135 watts 300 watts110 watts110 watts.I think the moron 12 pin connector is stupid. Just one more issue to happen.I will play with settings to see what it can get out of it.

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: I am not that impressed at 0.24 daily pure profit with Radiant in the first place from the comparisons,I hope it improves further.My two GPU-s Rtx 3060 ti and Rtx 2060 12 GB which are pulling in lowest power mode 205 watt both of them and I am mining Raptoreum the profit is 130 coins,which is 0.30 minus the energy goes to 0.24-0.25 which is the same almost to this new GPU.I hope this is just the beginning and Nvidia other drivers that will come with the passing of time improve such card or if not I hope the price will go to a more affordable level at 250-300 dollars,I doubt the price right now is ideal but it was a good choice to try it out.

comments.author: rdluffy
comments.body: Quote from: philipma1957 on April 15, 2023, 05:35:28 PMYeah first off I got this one.https://www.bestbuy.com/site/nvidia-geforce-rtx-4070-12gb-gddr6x-graphics-card-titanium-and-black/6539358.p?skuId=6539358here it is paired with a 3090 just Hooked up to do octopusit pulls 134 watts to do 59 mhand 3090 pulls 299 watts to do 99 mhclearly more efficient than a 3090 while doing octopus.I thought you bought the Asus, with 1 8-pin connector hehehe.I think the founder's edition is beautiful, I never managed to buy one, it's very hard to get one outside the US.Have you ever tried to mine 2 or 3 coins at the same time with one of these gpus?I've seen a lot of people doing it, but I haven't tried it myself.I think it's Kaspa+ETC+ZILThanks for pictures

comments.author: philipma1957
comments.body: Every gpu in the photos except the 4070 has done etc+zil at ezilbut this octopus conflux is a bit more than etc+zilI should try and see if I can do the three.

comments.author: sxemini
comments.body: Quote from: philipma1957 on April 18, 2023, 04:45:46 AMEvery gpu in the photos except the 4070 has done etc+zil at ezilbut this octopus conflux is a bit more than etc+zilI should try and see if I can do the three.I mine Conflux 54mh + Kas 400mh + Zil 58mh @ 180w with my 3070 at the moment for some tests. i hope we get more dual algos for conflux like rxd, alephium, ironfish. and for sure, i hope some miner devs keep an eye on conflux, because gminer devfee is to high, but they can take it, because we have no really good other choice.

comments.author: philipma1957
comments.body: Quote from: sxemini on April 18, 2023, 10:14:56 AMQuote from: philipma1957 on April 18, 2023, 04:45:46 AMEvery gpu in the photos except the 4070 has done etc+zil at ezilbut this octopus conflux is a bit more than etc+zilI should try and see if I can do the three.I mine Conflux 54mh + Kas 400mh + Zil 58mh @ 180w with my 3070 at the moment for some tests. i hope we get more dual algos for conflux like rxd, alephium, ironfish. and for sure, i hope some miner devs keep an eye on conflux, because gminer devfee is to high, but they can take it, because we have no really good other choice.What pool allows that combo?I am using some gear on ezil which does etc + zilLiving in USA I have a lot of issues finding exchanges to support coins.I put my zilla in a wallet it is hard to find a US based exchange that allows trading it.I put my CFX in a wallet it is hard to find a US based exchange that allows trading it.If I go Conflux + kas  + zil and use a pool I also will need to figure how to hold or trade those coins.We are very limited to exchanges and coins in USA.

comments.author: sxemini
comments.body: Quote from: philipma1957 on April 18, 2023, 01:26:41 PMQuote from: sxemini on April 18, 2023, 10:14:56 AMQuote from: philipma1957 on April 18, 2023, 04:45:46 AMEvery gpu in the photos except the 4070 has done etc+zil at ezilbut this octopus conflux is a bit more than etc+zilI should try and see if I can do the three.I mine Conflux 54mh + Kas 400mh + Zil 58mh @ 180w with my 3070 at the moment for some tests. i hope we get more dual algos for conflux like rxd, alephium, ironfish. and for sure, i hope some miner devs keep an eye on conflux, because gminer devfee is to high, but they can take it, because we have no really good other choice.What pool allows that combo?I am using some gear on ezil which does etc + zilLiving in USA I have a lot of issues finding exchanges to support coins.I put my zilla in a wallet it is hard to find a US based exchange that allows trading it.I put my CFX in a wallet it is hard to find a US based exchange that allows trading it.If I go Conflux + kas  + zil and use a pool I also will need to figure how to hold or trade those coins.We are very limited to exchanges and coins in USA.What pool? You can choose every pool you want, not the pool is the point, choose the right miner - gminer at the moment for cfx+kas+zil. Gminer also has the option to continue mining while it mine zil - you can adjust the dual hashrate in zil windows too. My kaspa hasrate at the zilliqa mining went up from 400mh to 500mh for this short. so you loose nothing on the 2 algo, other miners loosing 3 - 4% mining time if you add Zil (as often explained - zil mining window is overall longer than 1 minute!!!!!)And why you using ezil for zil? use flexpool or crazypool - a lot higher reward of coins. I know some people fudding flexpool, but the rewards on zmp flexpool for zil is same or higher as crazypool with less mining time. i tested it now for 3 months and checked all every day.you don´t need a etc+zil pool anymore or for long time. miner developers added native zil mining option to there miners. Teamredminer can mine 3 coins on 3 different pools at the same time - same for: SRBminer, Rigelminer, BZminer, Gminer, TRM for sureother good option is ergo+kas/rxd/aleph/iron..... +zilYou cant use Binance or Coinbase for selling your coins? Sorry i don´t know much about the USA law about crypto.
